definition: Tiger Balm (medicine)/jack of all trades (and master of none)(slang)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: This building was the 1st factory in Singapore which belonged to Tiger Balm .
sentences.chinese: 这个厂房是新加坡第一间工厂，就是万金油的工厂。

sentences.english: For in earth is the balm of Nature, and the salt of the Sages.
sentences.chinese: 在地球是万金油的性质和盐的圣贤。

sentences.english: Tiger Balm is a popular balm or ointment that people use for external soreness.
sentences.chinese: 万金油是很常见的镇痛软膏或治疗肌肉酸痛的软膏。

definition: qualified/competent (professionally)/to be up to a task
blaster/soldier or workman who sets off explosive charges/petardier

marginalized people (not part of mainstream society)/marginal man (term coined by social psychologist Kurt Lewin, referring to a person in transition between two cultures or social groups, not fully belonging to either)
chicken ribs/sth of little value or interest/sth of dubious worth that one is reluctant to give up/to be physically weak
like a fish back in water (idiom); glad to be back in one's proper surroundings
